sourcesContent: import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import StoreContext from '../store' import Layout from '../components/layout' import Button from '../components/button' import { THEME } from '../constants' import { Title } from '../components/text' function HomePage() { const store = useContext(StoreContext) return ( Vamos! <div> Change Theme{' '} <Button onClick={() => store.changeTheme( store.theme === THEME.LIGHT ? THEME.DARK : THEME.LIGHT ) } > {store.theme === THEME.LIGHT ? 'Dark' : 'Light'} </Button> </div> <br /> <br /> <div> API url (env): <b>{process.env.API_URL}</b> </div> </Layout> ) } export default HomePage
